description: Tickets will be offered to Manx commuters left stuck in traffic due to work on Douglas Promenade.
title: Free bus travel to ease Douglas Promenade revamp congestion
title_page: Free bus travel to ease Douglas Promenade revamp congestion - BBC News
maintext: He added that free bus travel for people living further along the eastern coast of the island - including Maughold and Ramsey - would be considered once the department had assessed the current initiative.
